amendment.description: Amendment increases the amount rescinded from OSHA salaries and expenses by $3.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the amount rescinded from OSHA salaries and expenses by $3.5 million to $19.5 million. The amendment is intended to stop work on OSHA's proposed ergonomics standard.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLay amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 254 - 168 (Roll no. 242).
